Review.Titre: Not truly magnetic waste of money
It broke when I tried tightening it
Review.Contenu: It broke when I tried tightening it.  Very disappointed

Review.Titre: they sent me the wrong item
Review.Contenu: they sent me the wrong item. After I emailed pic of what I ordered vs what I received, they said they would send the correct one. Unfortunately, by the time it arrived I had already gone on the trip that I had initially bought it for. And worst of all, they sent the exact "wrong" item again! Not sure what's going on in shipping dept.update: I reached out again and they sent me a third wrong item. When I reached out after than they advised me that the item I wanted was sold out. I found a device that works for me elsewhere. I'm taking it as a sign that it wasn't meant to be.

Review.Titre: moved the phone holder around a few…
Review.Contenu: moved the phone holder around a few times in the vent and the rubber came off one of the posts and the metal is now sticking out. The quality is not there ,very disappointed in product.

Review.Titre: The mount fell from place I cleaned…
Review.Contenu: The mount fell from place I cleaned with supplied pads and mounted it on the cleaned surface..once I put my phone on it it fell off. Didn't seem pad was stick enough.

Review.Titre: I never received the merchandise I…
Review.Contenu: I never received the merchandise I bought.

Review.Titre: Both of the holders that i have bought…
Review.Contenu: Both of the holders that i have bought do not hold my phone. Everytime i drive it titles to the left & tends to fall.

Review.Titre: I ordered and paid for the product but…
Review.Contenu: I ordered and paid for the product but never received it

Review.Titre: Have not received the item yet... what happened?
Review.Contenu: Have not received the item yet...

Review.Titre: OK, but the magent failed to hold the phone...
Review.Contenu: I got this for my wife who travels extensively. When she 1st tried it, everything fit fine. But the magnet was TOO WEAK to hold her Android phone. No matter how she placed the phone, it eventually fell off.She's trying to save the purchase by adding a magnet to her phone before using the Wizzer. But that sort of defeats the purpose of the holder doesn't it.We found it hard to believe that the thing didn't easily hold all commonly used phones. But  that's what we found.

Review.Titre: Polite but falls short on action
Review.Contenu: I cancelled my order about 20 min after placing it.  They said they would cancel the order, but then a few days later, got an email stating the order was being shipped.  Contacted them again.  They said there was an error on their end and to wait til I receive the item.  Now 2 weeks later. no pkg received NOR a refund.  Contacted them a 3rd time.  Customer service says I should be getting a refund.  I hope.   Very polite CS but I’d rather have my money back.

Review.Titre: Phone does not stay on magnet
Review.Contenu: Phone does not stay on magnet,  every bump on the highway hit and the phone slides off.

This is my third WixGear Universal Stick-On Dashboard Magnetic Car Mount Holder in 3 years. I find it the most useful tool (really like it) to hold my phone when driving and using maps. It seems the tightening knob on the swivel mechanism does not hold up to usage and cracks appart, thus making the magnet fall off. This last time I had trouble removing the sticky mount and it messed up my dashboard permanently.

Review.Titre: magnetized cell phone holder is not powerful enough. I hit a pot hole and phone slid right off!
Review.Contenu: I have contacted WixGear to let them know that the magnetized model did not work for me. I would like the same type of dash mount, but with the cell phone clip instead. I was under the impression that they were going to send me a new unit, but haven't heard or received anything......

Review.Titre: I’ve used this product before and loved…
Review.Contenu: I’ve used this product before and loved it. Therefore, when I bought my new car, I couldn’t wait to get another.  Ordered one and it was delivered quickly, without problems.  Sadly, when I tried to install it, it does not adhere.  😞 I was looking forward to having it in my new car.

Review.Titre: The air vent Wiz I got was amazing the…
Review.Contenu: The air vent Wiz I got was amazing the stand up car suction cup one was not.  Very bad adhesive, do not recommend.

Review.Titre: It is a good product But it does have a…
Review.Contenu: It is a good product But it does have a problem staying on the air vent. My air vents are horizontal.
Great item but stem should be longer to lift above cup holder area
Good quality and design. Reliable service and long work life. Best hands free device I have used for driving.

Vent phone mount with magnet. Works great! However, I had a PopSocket phone case that your representative advised the rectangular magnet would work well with. It didn't so I recommend adhering magnet to a regular (flat) phone case. Otherwise, the system works great. Highly recommend.
Magnetic phone holder is great, the tilt base seems to slowly loosen while driving causing the phone to tilt out of sight

Review.Titre: I like Wizgear products in general
Review.Contenu: I like Wizgear products in general.  I purchased the CD phone holder due to the fact my other phone mount had a sticky suction cup that melted on my dash.  The one with the suction cup worked much better than the CD phone holder.  Both products do work but the CD phone mount bounces when your driving down the road. The one with the suction cup was much more stableI however I really did not like the suction cup melting on my dash.  It  was very difficult to clean off the dash.I guess I will use the CD phone mount until wizgear comes out with a better dash mount phone holder.

Review.Titre: Not good if using a wireless charger paf
Review.Contenu: Although I wanted to like it and know people who love it, for my phone it could not work.  I use a Samsung wireless charger pad and unfortunately the magnet placed on the back of the phone then blocks the spot on the charger to work.   Very disappointed.
The elastic piece is too small for most modern phones including mine. Would have been cool if there were a couple different sizes provided.
The adhesive pads work great and are strong! The small wipes that are used to pretreat the surface were dry in their package.
Excellent Service, Delivery Time, and Product is exactly as it is detailed. Shipping to Guam, not a problem.

Review.Titre: The vent clip I wanted was what my son…
Review.Contenu: The vent clip I wanted was what my son had, my vent goes back further than your clip does, so my vent moves  and the phone twists

Review.Titre: I have order a couple dozen of the vent…
Review.Contenu: I have order a couple dozen of the vent phone holders and they are all working well without issue.
10 days after the purchase: So far so good.Fully functional as advertised. Given the price item seems be a good value.

Review.Titre: Took care of my missing part that i…
Review.Contenu: Took care of my missing part that i ordered with out further delays.
Love the high quality products and direct-to-customer sales (for those of us who despise Amazon). They're also quick shippers.

Review.Titre: I got my order very quick
Review.Contenu: I got my order very quick! Plus, this is a good quality product!

To be honest,  when I first saw it I was very skeptical.  As I was mounting it in a 1997 Peterbuilt, I was rather impressed by the quality and thickness of the plastic and the sturdiness of the joint.  I was still wondering if the magnet would hold the phone in a rough riding environment.  After a week of driving,  there were no issues of the phone falling,  it held it secure even when driving through a farm field.  I am more than impressed with this phone holder.  Good job WixGear.

Review.Titre: Product is awesome, Customer service beyond beatable!
Review.Contenu: Product is awesome. Customer service is even better. I couldn't figure out why my product isn't installed correctly. When customer service figured out that my location wasn't too far away from theirs, no other then the company CEO made his way to my car to show me what I was doing wrong. Now, that's unbeatable royal service!

Review.Titre: Part was as described, A+ customer service
Review.Contenu: Great product and wonderful customer service. Highly recommend purchasing from Wixgear.
Timely service, great product & reliability.

Easy to order, quick to arrive. I had used these before with a different car and liked them very much. Spending more money for some that tip out from the vents may be superior, but these are great for the price.  Thank you.

I think I'm addicted to magnetic phone holders. I love these products. With gear has never let me down. They're magnets are powerful. I've had other magnet holders and they just don't get the job done. He's reliable. I love my customer service. I've used them for warranty and questions. They're super responsive. Great company. great product.

Works Great! The CD Player mount which now holds my Moto G Power Android is genius. Intelligent Inventiveness on your part. Yoir website was east to navigate and the shipment arrived in timely fashion. Thank You for your product and service.

Review.Titre: A very useful and affordable stylus,
Review.Contenu: The items I ordered from WixGear are of the highest quality and the quickest delivery.  The three options offered by these, (stylus, pen and flashlight) come into play almost every day.  I have not found one that rivals it.

I used a WizGear magnetic phone holder in conjunction with a ProClip center mount. They worked perfectly together to hold my Galaxy A12. I would highly recommend these to keep your phone stable and well within reach.

Review.Titre: I like that they have strong magnets in…
Review.Contenu: I like that they have strong magnets in their holders. My phone stays put on rough country roads. The shipping was quick too.I have a visor clip one but it was a little to big for my vehicle so I went to the stick-on type and it is working great.

I received a wrong size in one of my orders and I contacted customer service and the representative e-mailed me a return label so I can receive a credit or return. I am more then satisfied with the service and will continue to purchase. My Thanks to Maricel, she is an excellent service rep.Terry Ratledge
Order was received in a very timely manner. Well packaged with good instructions. Reasonable supply of magnets for optional uses. I am very pleased with my purchase!

Review.Titre: I placed an order with "WizGear for a cell phone holder.
Review.Contenu: I placed an order with "WizGear for a cellphone holder to mount on my scooter. The process of ordering the item went incident-free and the delivery was prompt. The item I ordered was what I expected and operated just fine. I recommend WizGear and would order from them again.

Review.Titre: Great product in colors that compliment…
Review.Contenu: Great product in colors that compliment our new Galaxy s23 Ultras.  I used double-sided tape to attach product to phone and covered with a TPU transparent case.  Works perfectly.

Review.Titre: Phone mounts work good so far so happy…
Review.Contenu: Phone mounts work good so far so happy for now.  First time customer so hope they work well for a long time.
I bought a bigger magnetic phone mount to replace the one i had in my car and I am not disappointed. Durable product, I installed over 3 years ago. Beyond satisfied.
Excellent equipment. great service and a great price, along with super delivery, I would recommend to all my friends, if they need something to contact you.  Thanks Again.   Terry Ratledge
They did great , had a little issue with the first thing I received, but they got me a new item within 4 days of sending them a message about it , that's great customer service
Great experience! Great price! My cup phone holder works awesome and was sent to me VERY quickly! I would definitely recommend this company to all my friends and family!

Review.Titre: Searched high and low for an affordable…
Review.Contenu: Searched high and low for an affordable phone cup holder and came across an option from Wizgear..and to date I am extremely satisfied with my purchase.
These products actually work. Nice to make an online purchase and have it actually do as advertised.

WizGear had good info on line with video's and detailed info to explain their products.  Ordered what I wanted and received it in good time.  Did not have to wait three months like other online shopping locations.Thanks!
Fits good , no complaints. I drive so it’s always being used.
Excellent service, very good product.  I have ordered from this company several times and they are reliable and products are top of the line.
This was my second purchase from Wiz Gear, I liked it so much when I got a new phone and case I ordered the magnetic phone mount. The item was received quickly and as described. Simple and effective.

Review.Titre: Great company and products plus quicker…
Review.Contenu: Great company and products plus quicker service
I'm using it full time when in my car.  The magnet is the right strength so taking it off doesn't pull it out of my cd player.
Love magnetic phone car mount. It's so simple - stays on the dash nicely. The metal plate on your phone is thin. The fact that the magnet isn't on the phone itself I feel is better for the phone.

Review.Titre: Ireceived the correct phone holder and…
Review.Contenu: Ireceived the correct phone holder and I'm quite pleased with it and also the quick turn around Thank You

Excellent customer service. Due to som me back and forth, I had ordered a new item before they offered me 10% off. They went back and credited 10% back to me after the ordered was received. That is over and above.

Review.Titre: After ordering on line the product was…
Review.Contenu: After ordering on line the product was shipped faster than expected ! Quality product with no hassle !!!!
Love it for my own car and easily taken on the road for easy accessibility in Rent-a-cars when traveling.
Works great my phone stays were it gets stuck.

Review.Titre: I really like the magnet phone holder
Review.Contenu: I really like the magnet phone holder. Fits easily in the car and really holds the phone in place. I have bought several over the past many years. Arrived quickly!!👍

Review.Titre: I ordered on a good price point
Review.Contenu: I ordered on a good price point, I received my order promptly, I tried the products, and they worked well.
The product delivers. Also, there are many options for different needs
Product was very well made and sturdier then expected. Shipping was fast.

Review.Titre: Products are well made and Customer Service Outstanding.
Review.Contenu: Products are well made. Customer Service Outstanding. Great Value for $'s.
Love these magnets, super low profile. the size is small but will hold some decent weight!I can't get enough of them!Thanks WizGear
Great product in the magnetic phone holders and quick shipping.
Looked simple to install and use-------and it was.  Holds my devices great, and you couldn't ask for a better price.  I really like it, and would recommend them highly.  Thanks for a great product.

Review.Titre: Terrific for car because it is not only…

Easy to use. I was worried it world not work on the area I wanted to mount it to since there was a slight curve to the dashboard but it worked perfectly.
The automotive one is great. The Bike Motorcycle one we shall see, it appears to be a great design.

The device holds the phone right where I need it. I love the convenience of the self-closing holder. And on top of everything else, it charges the phone!
Service was fast.  Products were excellent.  Over all I’m very pleased. Much better than Amazon.
